dataElement.name: DATE FIRST SEEN (TESTCER SPECIALIST)
dataElement.description: This is the date that the PATIENT is first seen by the appropriate specialist for TESTcer care within a TESTcer Care Spell. This is the PERSON or PERSONS who are most able to progress the diagnosis of the primary tumour.

dataElement.name: IMAGING ANATOMICAL SITE*
dataElement.description:
*IMAGING CODE (NICIP) and/or (TESTCER IMAGING MODALITY and IMAGING ANATOMICAL SITE and ANATOMICAL SIDE (IMAGING)) is required.
A classification of the part of the body that is the subject of an Imaging Or Radiodiagnostic Event.

extensions.extension: F: Typically not recorded. Unless the ATM makes it clear what the site is, the site of imaging is not recorded. Exceptions are mammogram (site recorded as breast);BRT ultrasound - user has to record site. [Usage for UGI CT sTEST (recorded 4 times on Live

dataElement.name: anatomicalSide(imaging)*
dataElement.description:

The side of the body that is the subject of an Imaging or Radiodiagnostic Event.
